titles.ar: باب الرَّجُلِ يَقْتُلُ الْمَرْأَةَ وَ الْمَرْأَةِ تَقْتُلُ الرَّجُلَ وَ فَضْلِ دِيَةِ الرَّجُلِ عَلَى دِيَةِ الْمَرْأَةِ فِي النَّفْسِ وَ الْجِرَاحَاتِ
titles.en: Chapter 19 – The man kills the woman, and the woman kills the man, and the remainder of the wergild of the man over the wergild of the woman regarding the (killing of ) the soul and the injuries

titles.ar: باب مَنْ خَطَؤُهُ عَمْدٌ وَ مَنْ عَمْدُهُ خَطَأٌ
titles.en: Chapter 20 – The one whose error is (like) deliberate, and one whose deliberation is (like) an error

titles.ar: باب الرَّجُلُ يَقْتُلُ ابْنَهُ وَ الِابْنُ يَقْتُلُ أَبَاهُ وَ أُمَّهُ
titles.en: Chapter 18 – The man kills his son, and the son kills his father and his mother

titles.ar: باب الرَّجُلِ يَقْتُلُ الْمَرْأَةَ وَ الْمَرْأَةِ تَقْتُلُ الرَّجُلَ وَ فَضْلِ دِيَةِ الرَّجُلِ عَلَى دِيَةِ الْمَرْأَةِ فِي النَّفْسِ وَ الْجِرَاحَاتِ
titles.en: Chapter 19 – The man kills the woman, and the woman kills the man, and the remainder of the wergild of the man over the wergild of the woman regarding the (killing of ) the soul and the injuries

narrator_chain.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنْ يُونُسَ عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ مُسْكَانَ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: إِذَا قَتَلَتِ الْمَرْأَةُ رَجُلًا قُتِلَتْ بِهِ وَ إِذَا قَتَلَ الرَّجُلُ الْمَرْأَةَ فَإِنْ أَرَادَ الْقَوَدَ أَدَّوْا فَضْلَ دِيَةِ الرَّجُلِ وَ أَقَادُوهُ بِهَا وَ إِنْ لَمْ يَفْعَلُوا قَبِلُوا مِنَ الْقَاتِلِ الدِّيَةَ دِيَةَ الْمَرْأَةِ كَامِلَةً وَ دِيَةُ الْمَرْأَةِ نِصْفُ دِيَةِ الرَّجُلِ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from Muhammad Bin Isa, from Yunus, from Abdullah Bin Muskan,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘When a woman kills a man, she would be executed due to it, and when the man kills the woman, so if the retaliation is intended, they (her heirs) have to pay the remainder of the wergild of the man, and retaliate him by it, and if they do not do it, they can accept the wergild from the killer, the complete wergild for the woman, and the wergild of the woman is half the wergild of the man’.

narrator_chain.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ حَمَّادٍ عَنِ الْحَلَبِيِّ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: فِي رَجُلٍ يَقْتُلُ الْمَرْأَةَ مُتَعَمِّداً فَأَرَادَ أَهْلُ الْمَرْأَةِ أَنْ يَقْتُلُوهُ قَالَ ذَلِكَ لَهُمْ إِذَا أَدَّوْا إِلَى أَهْلِهِ نِصْفَ الدِّيَةِ وَ إِنْ قَبِلُوا الدِّيَةَ فَلَهُمْ نِصْفُ دِيَةِ الرَّجُلِ وَ إِنْ قَتَلَتِ الْمَرْأَةُ الرَّجُلَ قُتِلَتْ بِهِ وَ لَيْسَ لَهُمْ إِلَّا نَفْسُهَا

وَ قَالَ جِرَاحَاتُ الرِّجَالِ وَ النِّسَاءِ سَوَاءٌ سِنُّ الْمَرْأَةِ بِسِنِّ الرَّجُلِ وَ مُوضِحَةُ الْمَرْأَةِ بِمُوضِحَةِ الرَّجُلِ وَ إِصْبَعُ الْمَرْأَةِ بِإِصْبَعِ الرَّجُلِ حَتَّى تَبْلُغَ الْجِرَاحَةُ ثُلُثَ الدِّيَةِ فَإِذَا بَلَغَتْ ثُلُثَ الدِّيَةِ أُضْعِفَتْ دِيَةُ الرَّجُلِ عَلَى دِيَةِ الْمَرْأَةِ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from hi sfather, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Hammad, from Al Halby,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said regarding a man who killed the woman deliberately. So the family of the woman intended to kill him. He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘That is for them. When he gives half the wergild to her family, and if they accept the wergild, so for them is half the wergild which is for the man. And if the woman kills the man, she would be killed due to it, and there would be nothing for them except for her soul’.

And he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘The injuries of the men and the women are equal, tooth of the man with the tooth of the woman, and a bone of the man and a bone of the man, and a finger of the woman with a finger of the man, until the injuries reach a third of the wergild. So when they reach a third of the wergild, the wergild of the man is double over the wergild of the woman’.

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ عَلِيِّ بْنِ الْحَكَمِ عَنْ عَلِيِّ بْنِ أَبِي حَمْزَةَ عَنْ أَبِي بَصِيرٍ قَالَ

text: سَأَلْتُ أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) عَنِ الْجِرَاحَاتِ فَقَالَ جِرَاحَةُ الْمَرْأَةِ مِثْلُ جِرَاحَةِ الرَّجُلِ حَتَّى تَبْلُغَ ثُلُثَ الدِّيَةِ فَإِذَا بَلَغَتْ ثُلُثَ الدِّيَةِ سَوَاءً أُضْعِفَتْ جِرَاحَةُ الرَّجُلِ ضِعْفَيْنِ عَلَى جِرَاحَةِ الْمَرْأَةِ وَ سِنُّ الرَّجُلِ وَ سِنُّ الْمَرْأَةِ سَوَاءٌ
وَ قَالَ إِنْ قَتَلَ رَجُلٌ امْرَأَةً عَمْداً فَأَرَادَ أَهْلُ الْمَرْأَةِ أَنْ يَقْتُلُوا الرَّجُلَ رَدُّوا إِلَى أَهْلِ الرَّجُلِ نِصْفَ الدِّيَةِ وَ قَتَلُوهُ
قَالَ وَ سَأَلْتُهُ عَنِ امْرَأَةٍ قَتَلَتْ رَجُلًا قَالَ تُقْتَلُ بِهِ وَ لَا يَغْرَمُ أَهْلُهَا شَيْئاً .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Ali Bin Al Hakam, from Ali Bin Abu Hamza, from Abu Baseer who said,

‘I asked Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> about the injuries, so he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘The injuries of the woman are like the injuries of the man until it reaches a third of the wergild. So when it reaches to be the same as a third of the wergild, the injuries of the man is additional by double upon the injuries of the woman; but a tooth of the man and a tooth of the woman are equal’.

And he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘If a man kills a woman deliberately, so the family of the woman intend that they kill the man, they should return half the wergild to the family of the man, and they can kill him’.
He (the narrator) said, ‘And I asked him<sup>asws</sup> about a woman who kills a man. He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘She would be killed due to it, and there her family would not be fined anything’.

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ جَمِيعاً عَنِ ابْنِ مَحْبُوبٍ عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ سِنَانٍ قَالَ

text: سَمِعْتُ أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) يَقُولُ فِي رَجُلٍ قَتَلَ امْرَأَةً مُتَعَمِّداً فَقَالَ إِنْ شَاءَ أَهْلُهَا أَنْ يَقْتُلُوهُ وَ يُؤَدُّوا إِلَى أَهْلِهِ نِصْفَ الدِّيَةِ وَ إِنْ شَاءُوا أَخَذُوا نِصْفَ الدِّيَةِ خَمْسَةَ آلَافِ دِرْهَمٍ وَ قَالَ فِي امْرَأَةٍ قَتَلَتْ زَوْجَهَا مُتَعَمِّداً فَقَالَ إِنْ شَاءَ أَهْلُهُ أَنْ يَقْتُلُوهُ قَتَلُوهَا وَ لَيْسَ يَجْنِي أَحَدٌ أَكْثَرَ مِنْ جِنَايَتِهِ عَلَى نَفْسِهِ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, and Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, both together from Ibn Mahboub, from Abdullah Bin Sinan who said,

‘I heard Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> saying regarding a man who killed a woman deliberately. So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘If her family so desire to they can kill him, and pay half the wergild to his family; and if they so desire, they can take half the wergild of five thousand Dirhams’. And he<sup>asws</sup> said regarding a woman who killed her husband deliberately, so he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘If his family so desire to, they can killer her for his killing, and no one reaps more than the crime upon himself’.

narrator_chain.text: ابْنُ مَحْبُوبٍ عَنْ أَبِي أَيُّوبَ عَنِ الْحَلَبِيِّ وَ أَبِي عُبَيْدَةَ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: سُئِلَ عَنْ رَجُلٍ قَتَلَ امْرَأَةً خَطَأً وَ هِيَ عَلَى رَأْسِ الْوَلَدِ تَمْخَضُ قَالَ عَلَيْهِ الدِّيَةُ خَمْسَةُ آلَافِ دِرْهَمٍ وَ عَلَيْهِ لِلَّذِي فِي بَطْنِهَا غُرَّةٌ وَصِيفٌ أَوْ وَصِيفَةٌ أَوْ أَرْبَعُونَ دِينَاراً .

en.hubeali: Ibn Mahboub, from Abu Ayoun, from Al Halby, and Abu Ubeyda,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup>, said, ‘He<sup>asws</sup> was asked about a man who killed a woman in error, and she was pregnant with a child. He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Upon him is the wergild of five thousand Dirhams (for killing her), and upon him for that which was in her belly for negligence, is a male servant, or a female servant, or forty Dinars’.

narrator_chain.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ وَ مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ إِسْمَاعِيلَ عَنِ الْفَضْلِ بْنِ شَاذَانَ جَمِيعاً عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ عَبْدِ الرَّحْمَنِ بْنِ الْحَجَّاجِ عَنْ أَبَانِ بْنِ تَغْلِبَ قَالَ

text: قُلْتُ لِأَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) مَا تَقُولُ فِي رَجُلٍ قَطَعَ إِصْبَعاً مِنْ أَصَابِعِ الْمَرْأَةِ كَمْ فِيهَا قَالَ عَشْرٌ مِنَ الْإِبِلِ قُلْتُ قَطَعَ اثْنَيْنِ قَالَ عِشْرُونَ قُلْتُ قَطَعَ ثَلَاثاً قَالَ ثَلَاثُونَ قُلْتُ قَطَعَ أَرْبَعاً قَالَ عِشْرُونَ

قُلْتُ سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ يَقْطَعُ ثَلَاثاً فَيَكُونُ عَلَيْهِ ثَلَاثُونَ وَ يَقْطَعُ أَرْبَعاً فَيَكُونُ عَلَيْهِ عِشْرُونَ إِنَّ هَذَا كَانَ يَبْلُغُنَا وَ نَحْنُ بِالْعِرَاقِ فَنَبْرَأُ مِمَّنْ قَالَهُ وَ نَقُولُ الَّذِي جَاءَ بِهِ شَيْطَانٌ فَقَالَ مَهْلًا يَا أَبَانُ هَكَذَا حَكَمَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) إِنَّ الْمَرْأَةَ تُقَابِلُ الرَّجُلَ إِلَى ثُلُثِ الدِّيَةِ فَإِذَا بَلَغَتِ الثُّلُثَ رَجَعَتْ إِلَى النِّصْفِ يَا أَبَانُ إِنَّكَ أَخَذْتَنِي بِالْقِيَاسِ وَ السُّنَّةُ إِذَا قِيسَتْ مُحِقَ الدِّينُ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, and Muhammad Bin Ismail, from Al Fazl Bin Shazaan, both together from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Abdul Rahman Bin Al Hajjaj, from Aban Bin Taghlub who said,

‘I said to Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup>, ‘What are you<sup>asws</sup> saying regarding a man who cut-off a finger from the fingers of a woman, how much (compensation) is regarding it?’ He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Ten from the camels’. I said, ‘He cuts off two?’ He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Twenty’. I said, ‘He cuts off three?’ He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Thirty’. I said, ‘He cuts off four?’ He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Twenty’.

I said, ‘Glory be to Allah<sup>azwj</sup>! He cuts-off three, so there happens to be thirty upon him, and he cuts-off four, so there happens to be twenty upon him. This had reached us and we were at Al-Iraq, so we distanced ourselves from the one who said it, and we were saying that the one who comes with it is a devil’. So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Shh! No Aban, it is not like this. Rasool-Allah<sup>saww</sup> judged that the woman would be equal to the man up to a third of the wergild. So when it reaches the third, she returns to the half. O Aban! You (attempted to) seize me<sup>asws</sup> with the analogy, but (it’s) the Sunnah, (remember) when it is analogised, (it) destroys the Religion’.

narrator_chain.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ جَمِيلِ بْنِ دَرَّاجٍ قَالَ

text: سَأَلْتُ أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) عَنِ الْمَرْأَةِ بَيْنَهَا وَ بَيْنَ الرَّجُلِ قِصَاصٌ قَالَ نَعَمْ فِي الْجِرَاحَاتِ حَتَّى تَبْلُغَ الثُّلُثَ سَوَاءٌ فَإِذَا بَلَغَتِ الثُّلُثَ ارْتَفَعَ الرَّجُلُ وَ سَفَلَتِ الْمَرْأَةُ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Jameel Bin Darraj who said,

‘I asked Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> about the woman between her and the man was retaliation. He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Yes, with regards to the injuries until it reaches the third (of the wergild), it is the same. So when it reaches the third, the man is higher and the woman is lower’.

narrator_chain.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ سَهْلِ بْنِ زِيَادٍ عَنِ ابْنِ مَحْبُوبٍ عَنِ ابْنِ رِئَابٍ عَنِ الْحَلَبِيِّ قَالَ

text: سُئِلَ أَبُو عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) عَنْ جِرَاحَاتِ الرِّجَالِ وَ النِّسَاءِ فِي الدِّيَاتِ وَ الْقِصَاصِ فَقَالَ الرِّجَالُ وَ النِّسَاءُ فِي الْقِصَاصِ سَوَاءٌ السِّنُّ بِالسِّنِّ وَ الشَّجَّةُ بِالشَّجَّةِ وَ الْإِصْبَعُ بِالْإِصْبَعِ سَوَاءً حَتَّى تَبْلُغَ الْجِرَاحَاتُ ثُلُثَ الدِّيَةِ فَإِذَا جَاوَزَتِ الثُّلُثَ صُيِّرَتْ دِيَةُ الرَّجُلِ فِي الْجِرَاحَاتِ ثُلُثَيِ الدِّيَةِ وَ دِيَةُ النِّسَاءِ ثُلُثَ الدِّيَةِ .

en.hubeali: A number of our companions, from Sahl Bin Ziyad, from Ibn Mahboub, from Ibn Raib, from Al Halby who said,

‘Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> was asked about injuries of the men and the women regarding the wergild and the retaliation, so he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘The men and the women regarding the retaliation are equal, the tooth with the tooth, and the fracture with the fracture, and the finger with the finger, same, until the injuries reach a third of the wergild. So when it exceeds the third, the wergild of the men with regards to the injuries become two-third of the wergild and a wergild of the women, a one-third of the wergild’.

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ الْحَسَنِ بْنِ مَحْبُوبٍ عَنْ أَبِي وَلَّادٍ عَنْ أَبِي مَرْيَمَ الْأَنْصَارِيِّ عَنْ أَبِي جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: أُتِيَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) بِرَجُلٍ قَدْ ضَرَبَ امْرَأَةً حَامِلًا بِعَمُودِ الْفُسْطَاطِ فَقَتَلَهَا فَخَيَّرَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) أَوْلِيَاءَهَا أَنْ يَأْخُذُوا الدِّيَةَ خَمْسَةَ آلَافِ دِرْهَمٍ وَ غُرَّةٌ وَصِيفٌ أَوْ وَصِيفَةٌ لِلَّذِي فِي بَطْنِهَا أَوْ يَدْفَعُوا إِلَى أَوْلِيَاءِ الْقَاتِلِ خَمْسَةَ آلَافِ [دِرْهَمٍ] وَ يَقْتُلُوهُ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Al Hassan Bin Mahboub, from Abu Wallad, from Abu Maryam Al Ansary,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘They came to Rasool-Allah<sup>saww</sup> with a man who has struck a pregnant woman with a pole of a tent, so he killed her. So Rasool-Allah<sup>saww</sup> gave a choice to her guardians that they can take the wergild of five thousand Dirhams, and for negligence, a male servant or a female servant for that which was in her belly, or hand over five thousand Dirham to the guardians of the killer, and they can kill him’.

narrator_chain.text: أَبُو عَلِيٍّ الْأَشْعَرِيُّ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عَبْدِ الْجَبَّارِ عَنْ صَفْوَانَ عَنْ إِسْحَاقَ بْنِ عَمَّارٍ عَنْ أَبِي بَصِيرٍ عَنْ أَحَدِهِمَا ( عليهما السلام ) قَالَ

text: قُلْتُ لَهُ رَجُلٌ قَتَلَ امْرَأَةً فَقَالَ إِنْ أَرَادَ أَهْلُ الْمَرْأَةِ أَنْ يَقْتُلُوهُ أَدَّوْا نِصْفَ دِيَتِهِ وَ قَتَلُوهُ وَ إِلَّا قَبِلُوا الدِّيَةَ .

en.hubeali: Abu Ali Al Ashary, from Muhammad Bin Abdul Jabbar, from Safwan, from Is’haq Bin Ammar, from Abu Baseer,

(It has been narrated) from one of the two (5<sup>th</sup> or 6<sup>th</sup> Imam<sup>asws</sup>), said, ‘I said to him<sup>asws</sup>, ‘A man kills a woman’. So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘If the family of the woman intend to kill him, they have to pay half his wergild and kill him, or else accept the wergild (five thousand Dirhams)’.

narrator_chain.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنْ عُثْمَانَ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنْ سَمَاعَةَ عَنْ أَبِي بَصِيرٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: جِرَاحَاتُ الْمَرْأَةِ وَ الرَّجُلِ سَوَاءٌ إِلَى أَنْ تَبْلُغَ ثُلُثَ الدِّيَةِ فَإِذَا جَازَ ذَلِكَ تَضَاعَفَتْ جِرَاحَةُ الرَّجُلِ عَلَى جِرَاحَةِ الْمَرْأَةِ ضِعْفَيْنِ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Usman Bin Isa, from Sama’at, from Abu Baseer,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘The injuries of the woman and the man are equal until it reaches a one-third of the wergild. So when it exceeds that, it is added for the injuries of the man, over the injuries of the woman, by double’.

text: عَلِيٌّ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ حَمَّادٍ عَنِ الْحَلَبِيِّ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ع فِي رَجُلٍ فَقَأَ عَيْنَ امْرَأَةٍ فَقَالَ إِنْ يَشَاءُوا أَنْ يَفْقَئُوا عَيْنَهُ وَ يُؤَدُّوا إِلَيْهِ رُبُعَ الدِّيَةِ وَ إِنْ شَاءَتْ أَنْ تَأْخُذَ رُبُعَ الدِّيَةِ
وَ قَالَ فِي امْرَأَةٍ فَقَأَتْ عَيْنَ رَجُلٍ أَنَّهُ إِنْ شَاءَ فَقَأَ عَيْنَهَا وَ إِلَّا أَخَذَ دِيَةَ عَيْنِهِ .

en.hubeali: Ali, from his father, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Hammad, from Al Halby,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> regarding a man who blinded an eye of the woman. So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘If they so desire they can blind his eye, and pay him a quarter of the wergild; and if they so desire to that they can take the quarter of the wergild’.
And he<sup>asws</sup> said regarding a woman who blinded an eye of a man: ‘If he so desires he can blind her eye or else take a wergild for his eye’.

narrator_chain.text: أَبُو عَلِيٍّ الْأَشْعَرِيُّ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عَبْدِ الْجَبَّارِ عَنْ صَفْوَانَ بْنِ يَحْيَى عَنِ ابْنِ مُسْكَانَ عَنْ أَبِي بَصِيرٍ عَنْ أَحَدِهِمَا ( عليهما السلام ) قَالَ

text: إِنْ قَتَلَ رَجُلٌ امْرَأَةً وَ أَرَادَ أَهْلُ الْمَرْأَةِ أَنْ يَقْتُلُوهُ أَدَّوْا نِصْفَ الدِّيَةِ إِلَى أَهْلِ الرَّجُلِ .

en.hubeali: Abu Ali Al Ashary, from Muhammad Bin Abdul Jabbar, from Safwan Bin Yahya, from Ibn Muskan, from Abu Baseer,

(It has been narrated) from one of the two (5<sup>th</sup> or 6<sup>th</sup> Imam<sup>asws</sup>) having said: ‘If a man kills a woman and the family of the woman intend that they kill him, they should pay half the wergild to the family of the man’.

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ الْحَسَنِ بْنِ عَلِيٍّ عَنْ عَبْدِ الْكَرِيمِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي يَعْفُورٍ قَالَ

text: سَأَلْتُ أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) عَنْ رَجُلٍ قَطَعَ إِصْبَعَ امْرَأَةٍ قَالَ يُقْطَعُ إِصْبَعُهُ حَتَّى يَنْتَهِيَ إِلَى ثُلُثِ الدِّيَةِ فَإِذَا جَازَ الثُّلُثَ كَانَ فِي الرَّجُلِ الضِّعْفُ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Al Hassan Bin Ali, from Abdul Kareem, from Ibn Abu Yafour who said,

‘I asked Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> about a man who cut a finger of a woman. He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘His finger would be cut until it ends up to a third of the wergild. So when it exceeds the third, there would be double regarding the man’.
